runs.comm: and it's four! Short and wide outside off, very poor delivery, he slashed at it and the ball beat third man
too wide outside the off stump and he doesn't offer a shot
can't control the away swing, he goes for the drive and misses, wide called again
tries to work it away to the leg side and gets a big inside edge to the pads
drifts on the pads and he clips it to the on side
gets across and punches it down to mid-off, good running

Dilshan goes first ball! And Pathan deserves all the credit here, he swings it in late and Dilshan tries to work it across the line and he's beaten, the ball hits the middle and leg stump. This delivery has fetched Pathan several wickets
drifts on the pads and he works it down to deep square leg
Jayawardene was a bit unsettled by that full toss, got a leading edge down towards cover
chipped away towards mid-off and not very convincing, he wasn't quite sure where to play it
too full and wide outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
full outside the off stump and jammed out to point
drifts on the pads and whipped away, didn't time it very well, but the ball nearly carried to the deep midwicket rope
gets across and tucks it down towards midwicket
Jayawardene makes room to slap that away through the off side but misses it
Pathan nips out two early! This wasn't the best ball, not the best shot either, he chased a wide delivery swinging away from the off stump, got  a thick outside edge to first slip
Pathan gets it to nip back in to the left-hander, hits the pads but down the leg side
moves back in and he clips it down to midwicket
drifts on the pads and he tries to nudge it away, hits his pads and dribbles away
good use of the wrists, he works it over midwicket and Yadav does well to slide and cut it off
stays back at the crease and pushes it down to cover
lovely shot, deliberately done, full and wide and swinging away, he reached out and got an outside edge wide of slips and third man, very controlled
this was better! Half volley swinging away and he merely pushes it through the line and  beats mid-off
full outside off and driven softly to cover
brilliant shot! Yadav swings it away but gives too much width,  Jayawardene merely punches it square of the wicket and beats backward point
nearly went all the way, Yadav drifts on the body and the batsman gets forward and whips it easily over midwicket, just falls short of the rope
short and wide and he deliberately dabs it down to third man, costly over for India
goes back and blocks it out

Jayawardene was hit on the pads on the back foot and the umpire was convinced that was hitting the leg stump, he was back at the crease trying to nudge it away, he shuffled across the crease, didn't look too pleased with the decision though, it hit him above the knee roll so it was a marginal call
lucky escape for Angelo! Gets an outside edge on the drive and the ball drops short of first slip, beats him and third man
clips it down to square leg
gets on the back foot and pushes it down to point
works it down to the on side
bowls it straight and he places it to the off side
breaks the shackles with a boundary, length delivery and swung away over midwicket, struck it cleanly
oh well this is sloppy stuff from India! It was placed towards point and it was a risky single, Mathews dived but there was nobody backing the throw, 4 overthrows there
clean hit from Mathews! Used his feet to the fast bowler, lofted him wide of mid-off, didn't bother running
punched it wide of the body, thought of a single but turned it down
stays back and clips it towards mid-on
punches it to long-on and jogs the single
this one keeps a bit low and he knocks it down the track
fullish on the pads and driven back to the bowler
Mathews shuffles across his stumps, changes his shot and dabs it to the off side
stays back and punches it to long-on, ends a quiet over
slightly down the leg side, called a wide, Dhoni lets out an oooh
gets on the back foot and pushes that back to the bowler
punched off the back foot through midwicket
good length outside off, crunched through point for a single
shortish, turns in from outside off, guides that to point for a single
smacked hard, good use of the feet, came down the track, got to the pitch and drilled it past the outstretched left hand of Rohit for a boundary
flat on middle, punched through to deep cover for one more
slightly short outside off, mistimes a pull, gets a single
shortish outside off, pushed back firmly to the bowler and it's fielded well on the follow through
the legcutter, short of a good length, beats the outside edge as it cuts away
pitched up outside off and it's driven straight to extra cover
short on the off, pushed towards midwicket and steals a quick single
shortish on the off, punched towards long-on for a single, tidy over from Kohli

well Thirimanne simply threw it away, he goes for the reverse sweep and the ball skids onto his stumps, Ashwin was bowling from round the wicket, he will feel a bit silly after seeing the replay, Thirimanne tried that shot against Pakistan too recently and it didn't exactly come off too well
goes back and cuts and Tiwary does well to stop it at point
tossed up slower and worked to midwicket
goes back at the crease and cuts him down to sweeper cover
doesn't turn, stays back and punches it to the off side
goes back and punches it to cover
gets it to swing in and he works it down to long-on
sweeps him but doesn't place it well enough to beat short fine leg
Mathews goes a long way across to paddle it away but he fails to put it away, he falls at the crease
drills a full delivery wide of long-off
drops it towards point and sets off quickly, good pick up but the throw to Dhoni was wide
full and swinging away and drilled down to long-off
drifts it in and cramps up the room, knocks it back to the bowler
attempts the reverse sweep, manages to work it down to deep point
Mathews moves across and innovates, paddles it past the keeper and fine leg slides and cuts it off
another reverse sweep, single down to point

that was risky! Mathews gave the charge and lofted it down to wide long-on, Raina made the mistake of standing far too forward from the rope, he then tried to back pedal and catch it one handed, too late
clips it down to square leg and they pick up a couple, there's another overthrow so a bonus run, the ball deflected off the stumps
full on the off stump and pushed down the ground to long-off
full and wide and crashed off the front foot to sweeper cover, it was wide of the fielder
tucked him up for room there, he fended it off one-handed and picked up a single
good yorker outside the off stump, tried to dig it out but missed
full and wide outside off and jammed out towards deep cover
edged! Well the bowling change worked, Dinda pitched it up and invited the drive through the off side, Mathews made room but got a thin edge to Dhoni
tossed up on middle and worked to the leg side
punches it down to long-on, SL need boundaries here
tossed up on the pads and he clips it to the leg side for a quick single
looked like the carrom ball, tucked straight to midwicket
outside off and driven straight to cover
full on the off stump and he doesn't offer a shot
well bowled again! The yorker length outside off and he fails to dig it out
drifts down the leg side and wide called, tried to whip that away
soft dismissal! Yadav pitched it up outside the off stump and had Mendis driving, chipped it tamely to Rahane at short cover, cupped it over his head, the momentum is firmly with India here
full on the off stump and driven down to mid-off
firm drive and Rahane does well to slide at short cover and cut it off
full outside the off stump and drives to extra cover, just a single
tossed up on the pads and worked down to midwicket
gets forward and drives back to the bowler

appeal for a run out, there's a direct hit and he's gone, Perera chopped it down to point and set off and was sent back, the throw from Tiwary was flat and sharp and on the stumps, Perera couldn't ground his bat on time, third umpire takes a look
clips it to midwicket to get off the mark
tucked towards midwicket again
makes room and gets an inside edge that beats the stumps
this one turns the other way and beats the outside edge
goes back at the crease and pushes it to the off side
Dropped Yadav has fluffed this one, Eranga swung this one wide of long-on, Yadav got behind it but seemed to lose it in the lights, it should have been taken
goes for a wild swing and misses
too wide outside the off stump, Eranga chases that and misses
forces that down to third man and the throw is flat to Dhoni, the ball hits his knee and he's  in pain
SL need more of those, good length outside off and forced away wide of cover, the sweeper gave up the chase
tucked away in front of his pads to the leg side
full and swinging away, he makes room but the ball was too quick for him
and with that SL lose their last recognised batsman, full on middle and off, he made room to loft it down the ground  but mistimed it, Kohli ran to his right from long-off and took it on the fall
Eranga goes for the big hit and he miscues it as well, it was in the air for a long time and Ashwin at long-off only just managed to catch it
short delivery and he backed away to slam that, missed it completely
and India round it off comprehensively! No last-minute panic tonight, Malinga backed away and tried to hook a short ball, got the top edge and Dhoni jogged to his left and took the catch
